short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Simple extension for easier scrolling or continue where you left previously

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: User can setup marks on the right side of the webpage to allow fast scrolling to desired location. Or if user must leave before finish reading a webpage for any reason, user can come back and continue reading from where user left previously at ease.
